level.heading: OFFICIAL END OF INSTANT GAMES (ยง 30-702)

level.text: The official end of any instant game shall be the date announced by the Executive Director. For the purposes of ยง600.4, the drawing date of a particular instant game shall be the date of the official end of the game.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to October 2, 1992, the D.C. Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemakings at 29 DCR 2202, 2212 (May 28, 1982).
